public class SIRtvFrame
extends CommonRtvFrame

This is the main window for managing Store Initiated (SI) RTV information.

Method Detail

initFrame

protected void initFrame()
Intitalize the frame and setup the data grid's row sorters for numeric and Date related columns.

Overrides:
initFrame in class CommonRtvFrame

doQuery

protected java.util.List<RtvHeader> doQuery()
                                     throws DatabaseException
Fetches the SI RTV header record data from the database.

All SI RTV header header records associated with a status of “I”, “C”, “S”, and “Z” are fetch from the database and packaged into a List collection of RTV Header objects.

Overrides:
doQuery in class CommonRtvFrame
Returns:
a List of RtvHeader objects
Throws:
DatabaseException

createDataGrid

protected ScrollableDataGrid createDataGrid(java.util.List<RtvHeader> list)
Creates the data grid for the SI RTV frame based on the List of RTV data items that are to be displayed in the grid data.

Overrides:
createDataGrid in class CommonRtvFrame
Parameters:
list - a List of RtvHeader model objects to be displayed.
Returns:
an instance of ScrollableDataGrid
Throws:
NotFoundException - the column difinition component was invalid or not setup properly.

openHeaderDetailListWindow

protected void openHeaderDetailListWindow(RtvHeader item)
Uses an instance of SIRtvDetailListDialog for opening the SI RTV Header SKU Details List dialog for a given SI RTV Header record.

Overrides:
openHeaderDetailListWindow in class CommonRtvFrame
Parameters:
item - an instance of RtvHeader used to fetch and manage its SKU details

updateHeaderStatus

protected boolean updateHeaderStatus(java.lang.String newStatus)
Updates the status of the SI RTV record to the value of newStatus which should only be Suspend.

Overrides:
updateHeaderStatus in class CommonRtvFrame
Parameters:
newStatus - the status that will be applied to the SI RTV record. The status, Suspended, is the only applicable value for this method.
Returns:
true when the SI RTV Header's status is updated successfully with Suspend. Otherwise, false is returned and the update status is aborted.

handleSelectionChanged

public void handleSelectionChanged(ComponentItemSelectedEvent evt)
Functions to enable/disable the Print and Suspend buttons.

If the status of the selecte RTV is "C"(Closes) or "S" (Suspend), the button should be enabled. Otherwise, the button should be disabled.

Specified by:
handleSelectionChanged in interface ComponentSelectionListener
Overrides:
handleSelectionChanged in class CommonRtvFrame
Parameters:
evt - an instance of ComponentItemSelectedEvent
